body.name: 11 Inch/5Qt Nonstick Deep Frying Pan with Lid, Non Stick Skillet with Removable Handle, Aluminum Sauté Pan Compatible with All Stovetops, Dishwasher& Oven Safe (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 8 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 8 mins
features: 【Durable Non-stick Coating Performance】The surface of the 11 inch deep frying pan with lid is made of granite non-stick coating, 100% PFOA, PTFE, lead and cadmium free, ideal for healthy cooking. Meet the various needs of the whole family for saute, steam, boil and shallow fry.

【Nonstick Stone Frying Pan with Removable Handle】Easily removable by pressing the red button. Removable handle is more stability and no wobbling. The ergonomic Bakelite grain handles for you to grip comfortably.

【Oven & Dishwasher Safe】The 11 inch deep frying pan can be placed in the oven for baking. Ovenproof up to 500℉ (Note: Please make sure you remove the handle before putting it in the oven!) In addition, two pouring ports of frying pan are very convenient when you pouring out food, such as oil and soup.

【Suitable for All Stoves】Premium aluminium alloy combined with magnetized base enables fast and even heat transfer. The 11 inch Skillet nonstick with lid coated made of cast aluminum, which is durable. Suitable for all types of stoves, gas, ceramic, electric, induction.

【Deep Frying Pan Specification】1 *11 inch deep frying pan, 1 *glass lid, 1* shovel. Non-stick frying pan size: Ø 11 inch, 3.1 inch high, 5 Quart large capacity. The saute pan with lid is deeper than a conventional nonstick frying pan. Please do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: AIKENBBKK NONSTICK FRYING PAN For A Daily Use Safe & Health - Designed with your health in the mind, our cookware is free of toxic materials for guilt-free cooking.High Heat Resistance - Good performance in thermal shock testing. No toxic fumes even overheated.Spouts on both side- help both left-handed and right-handed people to pour sauces and other liquids easily.Long-lasting - Anti-scratch, wear-resistant, keeps good non-stick performance even after years of use.Easy Cleaning - Rinse with water and wipe with soft cloth.Suitable for: √ Induction stove √ Gas stove √ Ceramic stove √ Electric stove

SUITABLE FOR ALL STOVE TOPS The base of saucepan heats up quickly and has good heat retention.The saucepan can be used gas, electric, halogen, induction, ceramic etc REMOVABLE&COOL TOUCH HANDLE Detached easily by pressing the red button. More stable, no wobbling. Anti-slip ergonomic handle for a secure and comfortable grip. CLASSIC GRANITE- NONSTICK Advanced nonstick coating provides long-lasting nonstick performance.Free of PFAS, PFOA, PTFE, lead and cadmium

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product is exactly what it is described and it was very handy. It also comes with a nice red cooking spoon and matches well for the cooking pan. Even though it is bit smaller than what I think but it heats up relatively faster than the big pans and makes a perfect match for fast and quick recipes. I recommend this if you are in a look out for a small size pans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t warp and bend on the burner, lays flat!
reviews.reviewText: I like the size, the looks, the even cooking surface, and the handles, & lid! I keep the 8” mate, inside the larger pan, with the handles. It stores small and looks great! My favorite pans!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great pan, but arrived used
reviews.reviewText: This is a fabulous little pan for frying up a couple eggs in the morning, or making a frittata, since it can easily go in the oven if you just pop off the handle. It comes off very easily, and I think it's a great feature. However, this pan definitely arrived used when I received it. Not the end of the world, as I just popped it in the dishwasher (it is dishwasher safe!). But it's definitely not okay to send a customer a used product. Otherwise, after cleaning it up, the pan works great, washes up well, and despite its small size, I use it more than I thought.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: perfect size pan for small things and when you don't want to whip out a large pan.great for a small family o a single person

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact Efficiency with Minor Flaws
reviews.reviewText: The AIKENBBKK 8 Inch pan is a superb choice for those in need of a smaller frying pan. Its nonstick coating is not only uniform but also aesthetically pleasing. The pan's base is well-reinforced, promoting excellent heat conduction, and the removable wooden-style handle is both functional and comfortable to hold.The feature of the removable handle, while seeming more like a novelty, could be invaluable for certain users. The latching mechanism that secures the handle is surprisingly sturdy, though there is a slight wobble from side to side, which shouldn’t pose any issues during cooking.However, there is a design aspect that could be improved. The center of the pan is slightly elevated compared to the edges, creating a challenge when frying with minimal oil. The oil and juices tend to pool around the sides, leaving the center, where the food is, less lubricated. This issue is further accentuated by the pan's highly effective nonstick surface, which allows food to move around too easily. While this doesn’t detract from the overall quality of the pan, it is something to consider depending on your cooking style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was drawn to this pan because of the removable handle and the pour spouts. I have saucepans with pour spouts but no fry pans. The handle is easy to put on and take off. There is no wobble. It is a tight fit. It came yesterday so I decided to make myself an omelet for breakfast this morning. I prepared the pan according to the care and use instructions and the result was an omelet that slid right out of the pan and was beautifully browned. This pan is about 2" deep with straight sides which I like and I think it will be really nice to use for gravy or sauces. I am also looking forward to using it for small batch of biscuits.The pan is as described in the listing. The country of origin is China and the English translation of the use and care instructions is a bit hard to follow. This company sells other pieces alone as well as in sets. I would like a whole set of these of pans.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Frying Pan
reviews.reviewText: Right out of the gate the coolest thing about this pan is the removable handle, for a feature I never had before I'm not sure how I have made due this long without it. The convenience for cleaning makes it a great feature and the locking mechanism on the pan ensures it's in and not going anywhere.The non stick performs above and beyond what you'd expect, and the pour spouts are a great touch and came in handy. Thoroughly pleased with this pan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars NonStick Durable Pan
reviews.reviewText: I recently ordered the 8-inch pan in grey with white speckles. We are upgrading our pots and pans and this seemed like an ideal substitution for what we had. My husband does most of the cooking now and he loves this pan. He indicated that the nonstick factor is as advertised. The handle, when attached, is sturdy and no concerns with the pan falling or the handle breaking. He did notice some discoloration after running the pan through the dishwasher. After it went through the dishwasher, the nonstick aspect was not affected.
